banner.text:
=> Meteor 0.9.2 is out, with our first support for building mobile apps
   in Meteor. This support comes via an integration with Apache's
   Cordova/PhoneGap project.

   Meteor 0.9.2 is being downloaded in the background. You can update to
   it by running 'meteor update'.

=> Meteor 0.9.2.2 fixes an 0.9.2 regression that causes the Meteor
   development server to listen on localhost by default instead of 0.0.0.0.

   Meteor 0.9.2.2 is being downloaded in the background. You can update to
   it by running 'meteor update'.
